description: A Road is a transportation space used by vehicles, bicycles and/or pedestrians.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the Road.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the Road.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the Road.

properties.name: section
properties.description: Relates to the sections that are part of the Road.

properties.name: intersection
properties.description: Relates to the intersections that are part of the Road.
